issues.fullMessage: The requirement for a final "else"statement is defensive programming. The "else" statement should either take appropriate action or contain a suitable comment as to why no action is taken. This is consistent with the requirement to have a final "default" clause in a "switch" statement.

properties.title: "if ... else if" constructs should end with "else" clause
